alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:59AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Baldwin, southwestern Santa Rosa and south central Escambia Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1159 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Lillian, or 10 miles west of Ensley, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pensacola, Ferry Pass, Brent, West Pensacola, Ensley, Warrington, Gonzalez, Foley, Goulding, Lillian, Myrtle Grove, Perdido Beach, Elberta and Floridatown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
